word:
Should he trust to his own strength and judgment, Saul would move impulsively, and would commit grave errors. But if he would remain humble, seeking constantly to be guided by divine wisdom, and advancing as the providence of God opened the way, he would be enabled to discharge the duties of his high position with 
                                                                           1017
success and honor. Under the influence of divine grace, every good quality would be gaining strength, while evil traits would as steadily lose their power.
